alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 2:31AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT ISLE OF WIGHT...NORTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON...EAST CENTRAL SUSSEX AND SOUTHEASTERN SURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM EST... At 230 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Wakefield to near Sedley to near Courtland. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Courtland, Ivor, Dendron, and Sedley around 235 AM EST. Zuni around 240 AM EST. Smithfield and Isle Of Wight around 250 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, Rushmere, Booth Fork, Pons, Chippokes State Park, Bethel Church, Ellis Fork, Dory, Poolesville, and Alliance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex
